baseRule.text: 若比丘。知比丘尼讚歎食。除舊檀越。波夜提。三十事竟
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ bhikkhuniparipācitaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjeyya aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 29

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer wissentlich eine Brockenspeise, die durch eine Nonne beschafft wurde, genießt, muß dafür sühnen – es sei denn, die Laien haben (diese Brockenspeise) vorher für ihn zubereitet.
If a monk eats almsfood knowing that a nun had it prepared, except if the householder had intended to prepare it anyway, he commits an offense entailing confession.

Si un bhikkhu deliberadamente ingiere comida donada habiendo incitado a una bhikkhuni [para que se la dé], excepto por comida que ya ha sido destinada por un laico para él: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。知比丘尼讚因緣得食食。波夜提。除先白衣時善因緣。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: 若比丘知比丘尼讚因緣得食。食者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻知苾芻尼讚歎因緣得食食。除施主先有意。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。知比丘尼讚歎因緣。得食食。除檀越先發心作。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！知比丘尼讚歎教化因緣得食食，除檀越先有意者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 29

translations.text: If a monk partake of food which he knows has been procured for him by means of the express interference (commendation) of a bhikṣuṇī, except where the provider had previously designed to give it, it is Pācittiya.

Jika seorang bhikṣu memakan dana makanan yang ia ketahui telah dipersembahkan karena ia dipuji oleh seorang bhikṣuṇī, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika kecuali sang pendana awalnya memiliki niat untuk mempersembahkan itu kepadanya.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘知比丘尼讚歎因緣得食食。除施主先有意者波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 29
